title: My Wife Is Way Too Relaxed Now
itunes:title: My Wife Is Way Too Relaxed Now
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I've been married for 24 years and my marriage started out great. My wife was beautiful and kept herself up and this was what attracted me to her. We started a business together after we got married and it was hugely successful mostly because of my wife’s sacrifices. She started putting the business in front of our family and she neglected a lot of her responsibilities to me and our children as the years went by. My wife also failed to be intimate with me and we went for almost a year without sex..................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
